ygData.subject: Re: Fear and level 16 spell questions.
ygData.msgSnippet: yes Rune requires cats eye agate, and if your in a large group they will love quickness, and you can just rest an med while they slice and dice. not sure about
ygData.messageBody:
yes Rune requires cats eye agate, and if your in a large group they will
love quickness, and you can just rest an med while they slice and dice. not
sure about levitate yet, looking for it now, or try to research it
----- Original Message -----
From: Scott Murawski <scott@...>
To: <eqenchanters@onelist.com>
Sent: Monday, June 28, 1999 12:15 PM
Subject: [eqenchanters] Fear and level 16 spell questions.


> From: Scott Murawski <scott@...>
>
> I just started using fear yesterday just for the heck of it.
> I'm always fighting stuff that trains and so I'm paranoid that I'll cause
a
> huge train while romping around
> the area stabbing the fleeing mob in the back.
>
> So the question is
> Suppose I fear a wisp and I have a pet. If I just stand where I am and
not
> follow, will my pet following the wisp cause a train if wisps are in the
area?
>
> Also, since I'm getting close to level 16, I might as well start pouring
on
> the questions
>
> Does levitate last long?
>
> I've heard that quickness doesn't last long and I notice that it has a
high
> mana requirement. What level is it
> mana efficient to use at? (eq similar to chaotic feedback, at lv 8, it
> isn't so mana efficient)
>
> I think I've seen it before, but I can't remember. Rune I uses a
component
> right? What is it?
>
> Thanks
>
> Azboklin the enchanter
